entry.title: The Absolution After the End
entry.summary:
Author: buck_enthusiast458

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,253Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 0

Summary: When I saw episode 17 of the new season I thought about making a lot more angsty and for it to be more of an irreversible falling out.A season 8 finale rewrite. "Edmundo, was I just a quick ploy to you?” "NO!" "Then tell me, why would you be so cruel to make me fall in love with you; just for you to break my heart again."

entry.title: space and time couldn't hold me away from you
entry.summary:
Author: goforeddie

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,421Chapters: 1/4Kudos: 0

Summary: “Are you a highlander?” Christopher’s tiny, impressed voice can be heard from the back of the room. When Eddie hears the voice that answers to him, he freezes right here and there, the letter in his hands tingling his fingers and he almost drops it.It can’t be.It’s a thick accent that answers Chris, one you’d have to spend time learning and getting accustomed to. One Eddie has. “Yes, lad, I’m from the Highlands.”Christopher gasps, “My daddy tells me stories of a highlander named Buck before bed every night!”—————or : an outlander buddie au

entry.title: Fault Lines
entry.summary:
Author: DaniWib

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 14,513Chapters: 3/3Kudos: 85

Summary: When a building collapse finds Buck lost in a maze of rubble and pain, he thinks he's reliving the day he saved all of the 118 – including Bobby. Disoriented and haunted, Buck fights to hold onto what’s real as he searches for his Captain. For the man he loves like a father. The man he can’t bear to lose.This time, he’s not going to fail. Even if it kills him.  [Fic is complete, chapters posted weekly Saturday nights AEST]

entry.title: Welcome to the family jewels
entry.summary:
Author: Elysya

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,699Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 1

Summary: There are a couple of fresh shirts on the dresser, the ones Buck had packed in LA the previous morning. One black tank top and a deep green one stretched on the shoulders, he picks the second one and walks his way to the bathroom on the other end of the hallway.   Grandma’s room has been shut, but even if it wasn’t, Eddie would have been okay. It is out of his system.    Always the same, these kinda things. He blows it out of the park with a stellar pity party, Buck has to get him back in one piece and then Eddie is good to go. Riled up and ready to compartmentalize and forget.   So, clearly, he’s okay now.  Eddie is forced to go back to Texas; this time, everything might turn out okay.

entry.title: Ice cream and salt water
entry.summary:
Author: Ficalicious

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,075Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 41

Summary: “Lets see-“ Where hadn’t Buck already taken them that they would still enjoy? Somewhere nice and accessible for Chris more than himself, “How about-" he smiled widely, “Okay kids. What do you think about the Santa Monica Pier?”“Hmm.” Rina looked at Chris, a faux thoughtful look on her face, “What do you think Chris?”“Will you win us prizes?”“I will win you as many prizes as I can.”“I think yes Rina.”“You heard the boy dad. Chris says yes.”“The pier it is then.” Buck grinned widely. “You two are going to have so much fun today.”...In which Buck's been having a tough week, and Eddie decides to cheer him up with the kids.It does not go as planned.

entry.title: Ravi Panikkar, Professional Menace
entry.summary:
Author: serenelystrange

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,374Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 108

Summary: “This is dumb,” Eddie huffs right before the minute mark, skin still his normal golden tan.“Then you’ll have no problem with another minute,” Ravi says, giving him an easy grin. He ducks his chin slightly, before looking back up at Eddie with a soft gaze.Buck wonders if Ravi’s eyes have always been so big and brown, and rimmed with such thick dark lashes. He’s met women that would kill for those, the bastard. In which Ravi delights in flustering Eddie with harmless flirting, and Buck thinks his head just might explode!

entry.title: rookie mistake
entry.summary:
Author: zanekeller

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,977Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 29

Summary: “Look, I get it,” Buck said, leaning against the lockers like they were at a bar. “You’re the strong, silent, brooding type. You’ve been here longer. You think I’m some punk with a death wish—” Eddie turned, slow and deliberate. “You think this is about me not liking you?” Buck blinked, thrown. “Isn’t it?” “No. This is about you thinking you know better than a team that’s been doing this longer than you’ve been legally allowed to drink.” or, season 1 Buck meets season 8 Eddie, and everything repressed has to come out eventually.

entry.title: Ghost Protocol
entry.summary:
Author: Death_Before_Decaf

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 10,668Chapters: 5/7Kudos: 296

Summary: Evan Buckley-Nash walks into the firehouse, ready for his first day using a different last name on his turnouts than his Dad’s. The only slight hiccup is the man who saved his life in the desert 3 years ago is standing next to his dad. Lying about his past might be harder than he originally thought.Or: Evan Buckley-Nash the SEAL lies to everyone all the time, and swears he’s totally fine (he’s not)
